channel.title: The Africa Prize detects learners' needs before responding
channel.description:
The inventor from Tanzania fell asleep in the front row, with his video camera aimed at me from a mini-tripod on his desk.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://peerlearning.is/incremental-improvements/
